text: KRSW (89.3 FM) is a radio station licensed to Worthington, Minnesota, serving the Marshall area. The station is owned by Minnesota Public Radio (MPR), and airs MPR's "Classical Music Network", originating from KSJN in Minneapolis/St. Paul. The station operates from the campus of Minnesota West Community and Technical College. *See also Minnesota Public Radio ==External links== * KRSW page at Minnesota Public Radio * Category:Radio stations in Minnesota Category:Minnesota Public Radio Category:Classical music radio stations in the United States Category:NPR member stations
title: KRSW
